name: Typelevel Jobsboard
description: A fullstack jobs board web application built with Typelevel and Scala3. The job board lets users post jobs, filter jobs, and integrates with Stripe(demo payments) to post jobs. Follows from RocktheJVM course Typelevel Rite of Passage.
